titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation of grace and pardon to all such as shall returne to their obedience, and submit to, and seek His Majesties mercy before the end of May next.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Oxford, the 19th day of April, in the one and twentieth yeare of our raigne. 1645.
Steele notation: maintai- rice Twentieth; Arms 41.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
